title: Sigiriya Ancient Wonder

itinerary.title: Sigiriya Rock Fortress
itinerary.description: Climb the ancient rock fortress, a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Explore frescoes and royal gardens.

itinerary.title: Dambulla Cave Temple
itinerary.description: Visit the largest cave temple complex with over 150 Buddha statues and intricate murals.

itinerary.title: Anuradhapura Ancient City
itinerary.description: Explore the ancient capital with sacred stupas, ancient reservoirs, and archaeological sites.

description: Journey through Sri Lanka's ancient civilization with magnificent rock fortresses, cave temples, and historic cities.
